title: Update WebApi buildCommandHandler to use real command execution
description: Modify the buildCommandHandler function in Service.Api.WebApi.hs to actually execute commands instead of just logging and returning dummy responses. This should parse JSON using Aeson FromJSON, route to actual ServiceRuntime command execution, and handle proper success/failure responses with event store integration.

title: Implement Command Execution with JSON Parsing
description: Implement the command execution flow described in command-execution-example.md, ensuring commands are parsed using Json.FromJSON and proper error handling when parsing fails.
